top.title: Microsoft introduces agentic AI tools to automate retail and B2B commerce operations
top.snippet:
Microsoft has announced a new set of agentic artificial intelligence (AI) tools to Copilot aimed at automating core retail and B2B commerce functions, including digital checkout, product data management, merchandising and store operations. The company said it designed the agentic AI tools, which it’s delivering through Microsoft Copilot and Copilot Studio, to reduce manual work, […]

top.rerankWhy: New AI tools for retail operations enhance efficiency
top.aiSummary:
AI-generated summary:
Microsoft has unveiled agentic AI tools under Copilot to automate retail and B2B commerce tasks, such as digital checkout and product data management, aiming to streamline operations and reduce manual work.

top.title: Ecommerce Trends: How Walmart is using AI
top.snippet:
As new Walmart CEO John Furner prepares to take over from Doug McMillon in February, Furner can expect the retail giant’s artificial intelligence (AI) and agentic commerce strategies to come up frequently as he decides how to best put agents and machine learning to use. “Every job we’ve got is going to change in some […]
The post Ecommerce Trends: How Walmart is using AI appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
top.rerankWhy: Walmart's AI strategies provide actionable insights for retail
top.aiSummary: AI is a key focus for Walmart as new CEO John Furner prepares to take over, with a focus on agentic commerce strategies and machine learning. The retail giant is looking to leverage AI across its operations to drive innovation and efficiency.

top.title: Most consumers interacted with AI customer service during holiday shopping
top.snippet: Consumers’ response to AI and automation is largely positive, but a majority still say humans provide better support, a Liveops survey found.
top.rerankWhy: Consumer interactions with AI in retail are increasing
top.aiSummary:
AI-generated summary:
A Liveops survey revealed that while most consumers had positive interactions with AI customer service during holiday shopping, they still believe human support is superior.

top.title: What shaped retail’s holiday season in 2025
top.snippet: It was a year of AI-generated gift recommendations, tariff upheaval and increased financial stress on shoppers.
top.rerankWhy: Insights on AI's impact during the holiday season
top.aiSummary: AI-generated gift recommendations, tariff upheaval, and financial stress on shoppers were key factors shaping the retail industry during the 2025 holiday season, as reported by Retail Dive in 2026.

top.title: Amazon rolls out Alexa+ web experience for its AI assistant
top.snippet:
Amazon’s artificial intelligence (AI)-powered assistant began rolling out new features for its Alexa+ tier of service in 2025 — and now the online retail giant is making that experience more widely available through a web interface. Emphasizing shopping, smart home controls and other Alexa-associated capabilities, Amazon announced that logged-in users would be able to access […]
The post Amazon rolls out Alexa+ web experience for its AI assistant appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
top.rerankWhy: Amazon's Alexa+ enhances shopping experience through AI
top.aiSummary: AI-Generated Summary: Amazon has expanded its Alexa+ service to include a web interface, allowing users to access shopping, smart home controls, and other Alexa features. This move aims to enhance the overall experience for customers interacting with the AI assistant.

top.title: CVS Health details AI-driven digital strategy
top.snippet:
CVS Health has outlined a broad digital and artificial intelligence (AI) strategy aimed at simplifying health care delivery. The strategy deepens consumer engagement and supports multiyear earnings growth. It positions technology as a core driver of the company’s next phase rather than a back-office function. At its 2025 investor day in December, the health care […]
The post CVS Health details AI-driven digital strategy appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
top.rerankWhy: CVS's AI strategy improves customer engagement and growth
top.aiSummary: AI-generated summary: CVS Health has revealed an AI-driven digital strategy to simplify healthcare delivery, enhance consumer engagement, and drive earnings growth. Technology is positioned as a central driver for the company's future growth rather than a back-office function.

top.title: US e-commerce spend reached nearly $258B over the holidays
top.snippet: Adobe Analytics data found consumer spending grew 6.8% compared to 2024, with buy now, pay later usage reaching a new high.
top.rerankWhy: Reports significant holiday e-commerce spending growth
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
US e-commerce spending during the holidays in 2025 reached almost $258 billion, showing a 6.8% increase from the previous year. Buy now, pay later services also saw a significant rise in usage.

top.title: Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026
top.snippet:
As we enter into 2026, inflation rates are increasing as prices continued to edge up at the end of last year. According to the British Retail Consortium, shop price inflation picked up to 0.7% year on year in December, against growth of 0.6% in November. This is in line with the 3-month average of 0.7%. […]
The post Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026 appeared first on Professional Jeweller.
top.rerankWhy: Discusses inflation impact on retail pricing
top.aiSummary: AI-generated summary: Inflation rates are on the rise in 2026, with shop price inflation increasing to 0.7% year on year in December according to the British Retail Consortium. This trend is expected to continue in the jewellery industry.

Their innovation and experimentation will continue to shape the high street in 2026.

top.title: Jewellery designer Solange Azagury-Partridge receives MBE

As always, these awards are handed out dur­ing the year by King Charles III and mem­bers of the royal fam­ily. Based in London, Azagury-Partridge runs her own jewellery brand Solange, with a […]

oneSentenceSummary: Microsoft's agentic AI tools and inflation pressures are reshaping retail strategies as companies like Saks seek financial stability.
introParagraph: Microsoft's agentic AI tools are influencing retail strategies as companies navigate inflation pressures. Saks is seeking a bankruptcy loan to stabilize its financial situation, while Walmart implements AI strategies to enhance its operations. In the luxury sector, De Beers reports a shift in diamond demand amid changing consumer preferences.
